alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 8:21PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CROCKETT COUNTY THROUGH 915 PM CDT... At 821 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Terrell County Gas Plant, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2083 And Highway 405. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
